Author: comicsansmasterfont
Text: Professional cyclists get these bike shorts that have built-in padding. Like a push up bra for your asshole. They’re super nice if you’re biking a ton and you can get some low-quality ones for kinda cheap.  Just a suggestion, because a friend of mine *cough* who is definitely not me *cough* may or may not have given herself painful hemorrhoids from way overdoing it on the bike without any butt padding
